General.Name: Heliad Equity Partners GmbH & Co. KGaA
General.Description: Heliad Equity Partners GmbH & Co. KGaA is an evergreen fund and specializes in investments in buyouts, growth phase, and special situations. The fund typically invests in healthcare, financial services, business services, logistics, entertainment and the entire service sector. It prefers to invest in medium-sized companies based in the German speaking region. The fund seeks to invest in companies having revenues between "10 million ($12.3 million) and "150 million ($184.74 million). It prefers to take majority and controlling minority stakes in publicly-listed and unlisted companies.
